channel.title: I need HELP!
channel.description: My friend is gonna run my server cause i can't leave my pc on all the time. So i told him that he needs to foward his port and he said he did... i tried to connect to his port and it didn't work... the client still said connecting to update server or something like that. If anyone can help me fix this problem that would be GREAT!

item.title: I need HELP!
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“spy man47, post:2, topic:334214”]1. Wrong Section.
2. Post in Server Help.
3. You are a First Time Poster,So I think you will have a ban
4. Make sure you put in the client the correct ip,not 127.0.0.1[/quote]

Dude i only think he get a warning for this, he is a FIRST TIME POSTER.

Read full topic
